TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Underline extends System.Windows.Documents.Span

Docs.summary: An inline-level flow content element which causes content to render with an underlined text decoration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Underline"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Documents.Inline childInline) cil managed

Docs.param: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline"> object specifying the initial contents of the new <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Underline>.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Underline"> class, taking a specified <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline> object as the initial contents of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Underline">.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example demonstrates usage of this constructor.
[!code-cs[SpanSnippets#_Underline_Const1](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/SpanSnippets/Window1.xaml.cs#_underline_const1)] [!code-vb[SpanSnippets#_Underline_Const1](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/spansnippets/window1.xaml.vb#_underline_const1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Documents.Inline childInline, class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer insertionPosition) cil managed

Docs.param: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline"> object specifying the initial contents of the new <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Underline>. This parameter may be `null`, in which case no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline"> is inserted.

A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> specifying an insertion position at which to insert the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Underline> element after it is created, or `null` for no automatic insertion.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Underline"> class, taking a specified <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline> object as the initial contents of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Underline">, and a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> specifying an insertion position for the new <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline> element.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example demonstrates usage of this constructor.
[!code-cs[SpanSnippets#_Underline_Const2](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/SpanSnippets/Window1.xaml.cs#_underline_const2)] [!code-vb[SpanSnippets#_Underline_Const2](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/spansnippets/window1.xaml.vb#_underline_const2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer start, class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer end) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> indicating the beginning of a selection of content to be contained by the new <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Underline>.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> indicating the end of a selection of content to be contained by the new <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Underline>.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Underline"> class, taking two <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> objects that indicate the beginning and end of a selection of content to be contained by the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Underline">.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This constructor is intended to initialize a new <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Underline> element such that it encloses a selection of pre-existing content.
## Examples The following example demonstrates usage of this constructor.
[!code-cs[SpanSnippets#_Underline_Const3](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/SpanSnippets/Window1.xaml.cs#_underline_const3)] [!code-vb[SpanSnippets#_Underline_Const3](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/spansnippets/window1.xaml.vb#_underline_const3)]
